title: Discover Asian Dramas
desc: Discover and search for popular Asian dramas in Korean, Japanese, Chinese, and more!

title: Movie Finder
desc: Search and rate movies you have watched! Get recommended movies based on other user ratings!

title: Toronto Food Places
desc: Displays a list of various food places in Toronto and surrounding areas! Includes Google Maps of each place.

title: Reactwitter
desc: A clone of the Twitter desktop application. This project uses Firebase for user authentication.

title: Time Sheet Calculator
desc: Calculates the number of hours worked based on the shift's start, break, and end times.

title: Stock Market Discord Bot
desc: A custom Discord bot that fetches stock market information from Yahoo Finance API.
tools: Yahoo Finance API, Google Cloud VM
